column5: Hey there all, was wondering if anyone knows of any places up hwy 11 or within say 100-150km N. from Toronto that my son and I could get lodging and a boat for the weekend? I have searched all the Ontario websites and haven't come up with much. Any input would be great.  There's got to be a small run cottage rental place somewheres out there!   Budget> 150-200  Accommodation's> roof/fire-pit/lou  nothin fancy  thanks in advance  Leafland
